vsParam:
Sorry to disturb you!
Our assignment are done~
Ah, you guys. Put it on the that table.

Uh... Bergamot Sensei, you seem quite busy,
what's going on?

Yeah, I am handling the synthesis commission
sent by the palace.
Wow, commission from the palace!? Sounds amazing!

Headmaster Jones Wort and I planned to synthesize this
together. But he got too busy, so I have to do it all by myself.

But this is a high precision synthesis, it requires a lot of time
for preparation. I didn't have the time to collect materials...

Right, [px].
Can you help me collect materials if you have time?

I've written down all materials I need here.
I am in a tight schedule, so, please hurry.

Yeah, sure! Got it!
Let's go collect, [px]!
Bergamot Sensei, we have collected all the materials you need!

Thank you. Can you lay them out there?
I am tied up right now.

O~kay, the synthesis has started?
Let me see...

Hey, [px].
Do you have any idea what Bergamot Sensei is doing?

Um, I mean, we use the same materials,
how come the results look so different...

No matter how complicated the steps are, it's still just synthesis.
You'll be able to do that sooner or later if you study hard.

I haven't teach this part yet,
it's a good thing if you are touched after seeing this.
You can come closer as long as you keep quiet.

Such complicated synthesis becomes so smooth and natural
in her hands... Sensei is really someone who has mastered all
four Elements.
Although we only see her in class lately...

Bergamot Sensei is really
an outstanding alchemist...
